ISSUE.TITLE: Allow using unpublished queries in alerts
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: copies https://github.com/mozilla/redash/issues/429 to port https://github.com/mozilla/redash/issues/97 upstream. Opening an issue to submit a PR against.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Allows using unpublished queries in alerts fixes #2659
